MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA6 postcode area of Frodsham affecting properties in Kingsley Road, Hazlehurst Road, Newlands Close, Top Road and Warren Court. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to replace a piece of faulty underground equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32am on 15th December 2020.
